annotation: <data-piece><history><entry><input>sudo apt install mysql-server</input><output>Setting up mysql-server (8.0)...</output><annotation>Goal: Install MySQL database server.</annotation></entry><entry><input>sudo systemctl start mysql</input><output>[ OK ] Starting MySQL Server</output><annotation>Goal: Start the MySQL service.</annotation></entry><entry><input>mysql -u root -p</input><output>Enter password:</output><annotation>Goal: Log in to the MySQL server as root user.</annotation></entry><entry><input>CREATE DATABASE test_db;</input><output>Query OK, 1 row affected</output><annotation>Goal: Create a new database for testing.</annotation></entry></history><current-entry><entry><input>exit</input><output>exit</output><annotation>Ending the session after verifying the database setup.</annotation></entry></current-entry></data-piece>
